header.name: Collapse-UI - Quality Modes
header.description:
§fChange the UI's Quality via Subpack.
Made by Arxance

settings.text:
Select which UI quality you want for the pack.
§cBe warned that "High" and "Beyond" Quality will reduce loading time and may cause performance issues.
§eBeyond Quality§f > §8Enables ALL features including layouts. will cause both performance and increase loading time.
§eHigh Quality§f > §8Enables animated hotbar and horizontal slider. will increase a loading time little bit and is not controller tested at the moment.
§eBeyond Quality§f > §8Disable most of things that are not needed. will reduce the loading time.
